title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7011.3 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7011.3 - Policy

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of this Part, each
facility shall establish and implement policies and procedures for the
operation of a substance use disorder treatment and transition services program
pursuant to a plan approved by the Commissioner in accordance with section
19.18-c
of the Mental Hygiene Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7011.3

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLIV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
